tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Dr Nitesh is very friendly. He explains everything to the  patient to the fullest satisfaction before and after the treatment. I have been taking treatment for the last 10 years.. I am 75 years old. Senior citizens are taken special care. His rates are very reasonable. He is **** ************* *** **** confident of his profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I got multiple treatments done with Dr. Motwani as follows1. Surgical removal of fractured tooth and implant in same2. Two cavities in two teeth treatment3. Cleaning and Polishing of teeth (I'm a very heavy smoker and had completely tarred teeth)Overall, my experience of all the above services was well above average. The entire experience of the clinic right from the time you enter and are greeted with a welcome drink, to talking to the doctor and understanding the issues, timely follow-up calls from the reception and ofcourse the treatment itself, all of these were perfectly conducted in a professional manner.I feel Dr. Motwani may not be the most cheapest doctor out there but his services and expertise are well worth the premium he charges.Overall, I would wholeheartedly recommend his services to anyone looking for nothing *** *** **** ****** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very erudite , simple and humble doctor. Brilliant in his profession and expertise. Soft spoken result oriented and  friendly. Makes the patient comfortable and relaxed. No aura of flamboyant arrogance. Explains dental treatment and procedure in easy layman's words. He runs the clinic with a dedicated, pleasant and disciplined staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ***** ** ********* *** ** **** ******** Her treatment for root canal was very detailed and she administered anaesthesia in parts to ensure that the right amount of anaesthesia was used. Also, she explained in detail the process of every sitting procedure so that I knew what to expect. Due to her skill in RCT treatment, it was painless and she also explained what to expect after the treatment. 

I had an infection upto the bone inside the gum so she was very skilled in reaching the depth of the infection. At every step she kept taking X-rays to ensure the right treatment was being followed. I would strongly recommend her for RCT and crown fixing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Clean, hygienic office. Doctor listened to my problem and suggested treatment. The procedure was efficient and painless. Overall an excellent experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Tooth Extraction,
review: I had gone for tooth extraction which was satisfactory however the dentist recommended root canal for the other tooth. So, I went ahead as advised by the dentist. It was very painful and the assistant dentist who performed the procedure *** *** ********* *** ****** *************** So I stopped the treatment & went to another ************ dentist for the root canal. *** ******* **** ***** ** **** ******* ***** ********* *** *********** ***** ** ***** *********** **** * ****** ******* ***** **** **** *** **** ***** ********** *** **** ***** *** ********** *** now I have to bear through pain for the next couple of weeks, make multiple visits to another dentist in the middle of a pandemic, ***** *** ****** ** **** ******* *** *** ******* **** ***** ******** **** ******* **** ******** ** *** ***** ****** **** *** ** *** **** ********** *** *** **** ***** ** *********** *** **** * **** ** *** **** ***** *******  *** ******* ********** ***** ******* ** **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have received treatments by  Dr. Nitesh & Dr.Nikita Motwani and Dr. Anita, the doctors and their staff are professionals. The Dental clinic is immaculate, kept with high standards of hygiene and comfort.  The doctors are honest and through in explaining dental issues before beginning treatment. Plus every team member are extremely helpful, working together as a team to help keep me comfortable while the procedures are performed.  Also Priya is a sweet and diligent at the reception to handle scheduling of appointments and any issues with ease. Thank you to everyone  at Smile Concepts for taking care of me and my dental health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Implant Fixing,
review:
Dr. Motwani, his wife and the entire staff are very professional. They create a safe space where your issue is diagnosed correctly and is swiftly resolved.
For most of us who are scared of visiting the dentist, this place is literally a one stop. From dental implants to tooth cleaning to smile correction - there is an expert for everything. And overseeing it is the captain Dr. Motwani who will ease your fears and guide you for the best course possible. His follow ups, patient care pre and post visit are what makes them stand out.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As a person who is scared and apprehensive to see doctors, I was really happy with my experience with Dr. Nitesh. He explained the whole diagnosis to me very patiently and made sure I was comfortable with the treatment he prescribed. He also guided me well for taking my medication and answered all my post op services. After several experience that weren't so great when it comes to dentists this was a good experience as it was pleasant and affordable at the same time. I would definitely refer Dr. Nitesh ahead.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I've been to Smile Concepts before but got treated by Dr. Motwani for the first time. He's friendly, quick and polite. Definitely recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Both the doctors who treated me are too good at their job. Very nicely explained the treatment procedure and treated also very well. Very professional. Even the helpers, receptionist etc are very good at their work.
It was my first visit through friend’s recommendation, and even I would highly recommend for the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Nitesh Motwani and his team are absolutely fantastic. They took the time to explain each step of the process, ensuring I was comfortable and informed throughout my visit. His expertise and attention to detail were evident. 
The clinic is clean and the staff (Resham & Riya) is very polite and respectful. 
I'd highly recommend Smile Concepts to anyone in need of a top notch dental care.

tags: None
review: I had badly infected tooth and sleepless nights because of that And as I was really scared of dentist I avoided visiting one . But one day the pain was really horrible and that's how I ended up visiting this clinic .The doctor was kind to  treat my tooth and  my dental phobia ..He is extremely supportive and is soft spoken.I got my tooth extracted and implants done  in one appointment! ..it was so painless .. Minor swelling was the only thing I had after surgical procedure  which didn't bother me ...I had my caps fixed  and I m highly impressed by their job ..Highly recommend !!! Thank u

tags: None
review:
To start with I was having all my tooth filled with huge silver fillings because of my age all my back tooth started breaking with the time which I have done  with some local dentist at Bhopal But after my transfer to Mumbai I visited Dr.Nitesh Motwani's clinic 
He then asked me to go for immediate extraction of my broken tooth and implant placement on same appointment.. 
Earlier I was very scared of treatment but once I opted the procedure believe me it was right decision very meticulously my work was done 
Today I am happy with my Implant tooth 
Highly recommend Dr.Nitesh for his approach to New Advance treatment of dental implant to my friends n relatives.

tags: None
review: Exellant work done for removing heamanjoma in upper lip.procedure done in most professional manner with minimum bleeding from lip.less time taken than explained earlier stitches came out smoothly.Histopath report was mailed and prognosis explained in most professional manner.My uncle ( patient aged 76 )  is completely satisfied and relieved of symptoms.we were administered a minimum of medicines during procedure , recovery was swift with no post surgery infection. Thanks for solving a otherwise complicated case into a simple one with 100% relief.thanks Dr.Motwani & his able staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My experience with Dr Swati was amazing ! The whole process of the root canal surgery was smooth with proper explanation step by step she gives and understand what a patient is going through she’s soft spoken . Highly recommend ! The clinic is well equipped with advanced instruments cleanliness is up to the mark . Ambience of the clinic is great as well . This is my third surgery with the clinic over all excellent experience! First two was done by Dr Nitesh Motwani .

tags: Doctor friendliness,

review:

Would love to visit the doctor again tough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ***** I took an appointment for extraction of my angular impacted wisdom tooth. Got my two wisdom tooth extracted without even feeling the pain. Doctor was quiet friendly and polite and understands everything about patient. It took almost 15-30 mins to complete the surgical extraction. Would definitely visit incase of routine checkups and also would refer it to my friends. 

Thank you doctor for the painless journey of wisdom tooth extraction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: state of art facilities, ************* *** friendly doctor, this clinic is one stop shop for everyone in search of a brilliant dentist. Visited in the midst of pandemic but the kind of safety protocol they follow that definitely add an extra comfort.  Thank you Dr.Motowani for your kind treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Nitesh Motwani is very professional and explains the procedure with patience and clears all our doubts. I went for cyst removal and then a tooth implant; which was a painless no swelling DENTAL experience!!
My husband could not believe it. As he had been though the same process done by his “known” dentist which was a painful one week for him. I am very thankful and highly recommend Doctor Nitesh Motwani. He provides fantastic service and takes care of the hygiene too!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very neat and clean clinic. Dr  explained very  clearly before starting  procedure. Very satisfied  with my treatment. Thanks Dr.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Toothache,Dental Cavities,
review: Would not recommend. I went to this doctor for toothache which turned into needing a root canal treatment. After mentioning that I needed a temporary fix for a few weeks since I was traveling for work, the doctor insisted on doing the treatment the next day and refusing any other temporary medications.I ended up getting a cleanup and I informed them again, that I can't handle pain and would need local anesthetic, they didn't help at all.The bottom half of my mouth now feels like it's scraped and hurts, I have mini cuts near the inside of my lower lip, *** ** ********* ***** **** **** **** *** **** ***** **** **** * **** ***I went to another dentist less than an hour later *** **** ********** ** ********* ********** ***** * *** **** ** *** *** ********* *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ****** ** *** **** ******* ****** **** **** ****** ** *** **** ** ******* I had bad experiences at my area and googled for the **** dentists around. Smile Concepts dental clinic is what popped up. I took a chance and it paid off. Dr. Nitesh is amazing when it comes to extractions and is extremely straight forward during consultation. He patiently listens to your problem and tries to give you the right solution for your dental ailments. 

I had the best experience of a dentist at Dr. Nitesh’s clinic, and would encourage everyone needing a tooth extraction to reach out to him.

P.S. Just loved the new clinic. Also, a worthy mention is that they strictly follow the covid measures as well as their warm staff and hospitality. Please keep on doing what you’re doing! Thanks!

tags: Value for money,

Still charged me his full complete consultancy fee inspite of doing treatment worth 9k one week before that. ** ***** **** ** *** **** ** ********** **** ******* *** *** ** ******** ******* ** *** ******** ******
